text: authors | body | category | created_at | headline | id | location | organizations | published_date | references | related_ids | severity | summary | tags | updated_at id: news_003 | headline: Anthropic releases Claude Opus 4.1 update | summary: Anthropic ships Opus 4.1, improving agentic multi-step tool use, coding accuracy and rigorous reasoning while preserving API compatibility. | body: On August 5, 2025 Anthropic released Claude Opus 4.1, an incremental but focused update within the Opus family. The release focused on agentic performance (multi-step tool orchestration), real-world coding accuracy and improved reasoning for research tasks. Anthropic made Opus 4.1 available to paid Claude customers and partner clouds, positioning it as an enterprise drop-in upgrade with stronger safety-oriented engineering. | published_date: 2025-08-05T00:00:00Z | authors: ['Anthropic release notes', 'industry coverage'] | organizations: ['Anthropic'] | tags: ['model_update', 'anthropic', 'opus'] | category: product | severity: info | location: None | related_ids: [] | references: [{'name': 'Anthropic release notes', 'url': ''}] | created_at: 2025-09-10T06:30:00Z | updated_at: 2025-09-10T06:30:00Z
